default.default.notes: this is the original discussion format for dasha-sip-test, preserving for view

mainIntroduction.text: Hello, this is Liiiz D. Wiiil,,, Chris'sz assistant... Would you like me to connect you to him?

transferTimeout.text: Hey... It appears you've gone quiet, if you're having phone issues you're more than welcome to try again later

hangUp.text: I understand, Chris and I hope you have a wonderful day. Good bye.

hold.text: Okay, please hold a moment while I check his availability.

unavailable.text: It appears he's unable to accept any calls right now... Is it okay if I leave him a message?

messageOffer.text: Understood,,, would you prefer I send him a message?

messagePrep.text: Okay... I have my pen and paper ready, say what you need..... When finished... Just tell me I'm done, or finished, and I'll confirmed I've saved your message... Go.
